description: The games will be played every 15 days on the PokerStars platform.
The inscription in each day will be 20,000 fictitious chips. Remember to have available balance.
Each game will start with 10,000 chips and the speed will be turbo without breaks.
There will be a late registration of 2 levels (10 min) in case someone gets confused.
At the end of the 15 games, the first 3 places will be awarded.
The total points are based in best 12 of 15 games.
Handicap is applied on the best 3 players and 3 worst players of last season (-30, -20, -10, +30, +20, +10). A player can only get handicap if has played more than 30% of last season games
Each player gains 1 extra point for each KO did on the game.
The last game, points x2 (only points by position, not KO's x 2). (Point x1,5 if season is short)
It is totally forbidden to insult or make obscene comments in the game chat.
If a registered player does not attend the game after 30', he/she will automatically score 0 regardless of the position in which he/she is left.
